Hello Linh,

I have received feedback from our R&D team and would like to relay to you their feedback.

Our R&D team prepared a test build with a fix for this issue. The problem was caused by an inconsistence between the threat count and the threats that were added to the threat list. Be aware that EPP counts only unique threats. This means that in order to have 20 threats reported, then 20 different threats should be in the test file.

Please use the test build to check if the problem is fixed.  Please use the following link to download the test build: https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/Epp13032025/EPPMac3.0.4.0039.Notarized.tar

Important Note:
This test build is not meant for deployment in production environment.  It is meant to be tested on 2-3 endpoints only for the purpose to validate if the fix resolves the reported issue within your environment.


Kind regards

First of all, I see that you have defined two Regex Denylists (one for phone numbers and one for email addresses).
That would definitely work, but I see that for Threat Threshold you let it 1, so that would block any mail address or phone number. For example, if you want to block 20 mails addresses or phone numbers, you should set the Threat Threshold: 20.

Secondly, please also note that EPP counts only unique threats (if the same phone number is found 4 times in the file, it will be counted only once).

In the attached screenshots, you can see that I tried to recreate your scenario with Threat Threshold: 2 and the threats (one phone number and one email address or just two phone numbers) were successfully blocked and counted.

First of all, I see that you have defined two Regex Denylists (one for phone numbers and one for email addresses).

Secondly, please also note that EPP counts only unique threats (if the same phone number is found 4 times in the file, it will be counted only once).

In the attached screenshots, you can see that I tried to recreate your scenario with Threat Threshold: 2 and the threats (one phone number and one email address or just two phone numbers) were successfully blocked and counted.
